info.title: Security Center
info.description: API spec for Microsoft.Security (Azure Security Center) resource provider

get.description: Lists all the security connectors in the specified subscription. Use the 'nextLink' property in the response to get the next page of security connectors for the specified subscription.

default.description: Error response that describes why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the security connectors in the specified resource group. Use the 'nextLink' property in the response to get the next page of security connectors for the specified resource group.

default.description: Error response that describes why the operation failed.

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific security connector

default.description: Error response that describes why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a security connector. If a security connector is already created and a subsequent request is issued for the same security connector id, then it will be updated.

default.description: Error response that describes why the operation failed.
Error response that describes why the operation failed.
Error response that describes why the operation failed.

value.description: The list of security connectors under the given scope.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

SecurityConnectorProperties.description: A set of properties that defines the security connector configuration.

hierarchyIdentifier.description: The multi cloud resource identifier (account id in case of AWS connector, project number in case of GCP connector).

hierarchyIdentifierTrialEndDate.description: The date on which the trial period will end, if applicable. Trial period exists for 30 days after upgrading to payed offerings.

environmentName.description: The multi cloud resource's cloud name.

offerings.description: A collection of offerings for the security connector.

environmentType.description: The type of the environment data.

scanInterval.description: Scan interval in hours (value should be between 1-hour to 24-hours)

organizationMembershipType.description: The multi cloud account's membership type in the organization

AwsOrganizationalDataMaster.description: The AWS organization data for the master account

stacksetName.description: If the multi cloud account is of membership type organization, this will be the name of the onboarding stackset

excludedAccountIds.description: If the multi cloud account is of membership type organization, list of accounts excluded from offering

AwsOrganizationalDataMember.description: The AWS organization data for the member account

parentHierarchyId.description: If the multi cloud account is not of membership type organization, this will be the ID of the account's parent

GcpProjectEnvironmentData.description: The GCP project connector environment data

scanInterval.description: Scan interval in hours (value should be between 1-hour to 24-hours)

GcpProjectDetails.description: The details about the project represented by the security connector

workloadIdentityPoolId.description: The GCP workload identity federation pool id

organizationMembershipType.description: The multi cloud account's membership type in the organization

GcpOrganizationalDataOrganization.description: The gcpOrganization data for the parent account

excludedProjectNumbers.description: If the multi cloud account is of membership type organization, list of accounts excluded from offering

serviceAccountEmailAddress.description: The service account email address which represents the organization level permissions container.

workloadIdentityProviderId.description: The GCP workload identity provider id which represents the permissions required to auto provision security connectors

GcpOrganizationalDataMember.description: The gcpOrganization data for the member account

parentHierarchyId.description: If the multi cloud account is not of membership type organization, this will be the ID of the project's parent

managementProjectNumber.description: The GCP management project number from organizational onboarding

GithubScopeEnvironmentData.description: The github scope connector's environment data

AzureDevOpsScopeEnvironmentData.description: The AzureDevOps scope connector's environment data

GitlabScopeEnvironmentData.description: The GitLab scope connector's environment data

DockerHubEnvironmentData.description: The Docker Hub connector environment data

authentication.description: The Docker Hub organization authentication details

scanInterval.description: Scan interval in hours (value should be between 1-hour to 24-hours)

username.description: The user name that will be used while authenticating with the onboarded environment

accessToken.description: The access token that will be used while authenticating with the onboarded environment

offeringType.description: The type of the security offering.
